name: YA International phone number
description: International phone number with 6 capturing groups: international prefix (00 xor '+'); 1 to 3 international code number, no zero allowed; optional space or hyphen; 0 to 3 local prefix number; optional space or hyphen; 5 to 11 local number without spaces or hyphens;Matches:0034 91 12345678+39-2-12345679112345678Non-Matches0034 91 123-456-789(91)123456780034 (91)12345678
author: maurizio trezza
